trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ720_02823_SEQ_00<tab>M'gizzoh is itching to go hunting.
TEXT_STMBDZ720_02823_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated location and slay any broken bhoots that appear.

TEXT_STMBDZ720_02823_MGIZZOH_000_000<tab><var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Nice night)) ((Good day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Good day)) ((Nice night)) /var>)) /var> for hunting isn't it? Especially now that the Garleans have turned tail and fled. Before you couldn't step foot from the Peering Stones without being dragged into a fight between them and the Resistance.

TEXT_STMBDZ720_02823_MGIZZOH_000_001<tab>Now that we're back to our usual haunts, I've run into a bit of trouble. It seems in our absence a horde of bhoots have taken a liking to my favorite place to hunt.
TEXT_STMBDZ720_02823_MGIZZOH_000_002<tab>They're always hiding on the cliff tops just out of range of my arrows, and swooping down when I'm not looking. Would that I had wings to fly up after them.

TEXT_STMBDZ720_02823_MGIZZOH_000_003<tab>Word has it you have a knack for handling seemingly insurmountable problems. It'd mean the world to me if you could scale the cliffs southwest of here and do away with the bhoots.
TEXT_STMBDZ720_02823_MGIZZOH_000_004<tab>You may not see them at first, but if you wait around long enough, they're sure to turn up. Be careful, though. They can be pretty nasty.
TEXT_STMBDZ720_02823_MGIZZOH_000_010<tab>The bhoots are gone? So you did scale the cliffs! That's quite the feat.
TEXT_STMBDZ720_02823_MGIZZOH_100_010<tab>A pity you're not part of our tribe. We could do with more capable hunters like you.
TEXT_STMBDZ720_02823_MGIZZOH_000_011<tab>But what are ghosts doing there to begin with? By all rights they should be busy brooding about a cemetery somewhere.
TEXT_STMBDZ720_02823_MGIZZOH_000_012<tab>Then again, Virdjala has seen more than its fair share of death lately. Hopefully any other spirits still lingering there will soon move on.
